ä¸ºäº†åœ¨å…ƒåŸºå› ç»„è§„æ¨¡ä¸Šè‡ªåŠ¨æ£€ç´¢åŸºå› ç»„å’Œå®ƒä»¬çš„æ³¨é‡Šä¿¡æ¯ï¼Œbiomartrâ€‹åŒ…æä¾›äº†åŸºå› ç»„åºåˆ—æ£€ç´¢å’ŒåŠŸèƒ½æ³¨é‡Šæ£€ç´¢çš„æ¥å£åŠŸèƒ½ã€‚biomartrâ€‹çš„ä¸»è¦ç›®æ ‡æ˜¯ä¿ƒè¿›è®¡ç®—å†ç°æ€§å’Œå¤§è§„æ¨¡å¤„ç†åŸºå› ç»„æ•°æ®(å…ƒ)åŸºå› ç»„åˆ†æã€‚æœ‰äº†biomartrâ€‹ï¼Œç”¨æˆ·ç°åœ¨å¯ä»¥æ§åˆ¶å¹¶äº†è§£ä»–ä»¬è‡ªåŠ¨æ£€ç´¢çš„åŸºå› ç»„ç‰ˆæœ¬ã€‚è®¸å¤šå¤§è§„æ¨¡åŸºå› ç»„å­¦ç ”ç©¶ç¼ºä¹è¿™äº›ä¿¡æ¯ã€‚å½“åŸºå› ç»„ç‰ˆæœ¬ä¿¡æ¯çš„è®°å½•è¢«å¿½è§†æ—¶ï¼Œå†ç°å’Œæ•°æ®è§£é‡Šå‡ ä¹æ˜¯ä¸å¯èƒ½çš„ã€‚ In detail, biomartrâ€‹ automates genome, proteome, CDS, RNA, Repeats, GFF/GTF (annotation), genome assembly quality, and metagenome project data retrieval from the major biological databases such as NCBI RefSeq NCBI Genbank ENSEMBL ENSEMBLGENOMES(æˆªæ­¢åˆ°2019å¹´4æœˆä»½ - ENSEMBLå’ŒENSEMBLGENOMESå·²ç»åˆå¹¶äº†- see details here) UniProt

å®‰è£…biomartråŒ…

è‡ªå¸¦æ•™ç¨‹

Meta-Genome Retrieval

  • â€‹meta.retrieval()â€‹ : Perform Meta-Genome Retieval from NCBI of species belonging to the same kingdom of life or to the same taxonomic subgroup

  • â€‹meta.retrieval.all()â€‹ : Perform Meta-Genome Retieval from NCBI of the entire kingdom of life

  • â€‹getMetaGenomes()â€‹ : Retrieve metagenomes from NCBI Genbank

  • â€‹getMetaGenomeAnnotations()â€‹ : Retrieve annotation *.gff files for metagenomes from NCBI Genbank

  • â€‹listMetaGenomes()â€‹ : List available metagenomes on NCBI Genbank

  • â€‹getMetaGenomeSummary()â€‹ : Helper function to retrieve the assembly_summary.txt file from NCBI genbank metagenomes

  • â€‹clean.retrieval()â€‹: Format meta.retrieval output

Genome Retrieval

  • â€‹listGenomes()â€‹ : List all genomes available on NCBI and ENSEMBL servers

  • â€‹listKingdoms()â€‹ : list the number of available species per kingdom of life on NCBI and ENSEMBL servers

  • â€‹listGroups()â€‹ : list the number of available species per group on NCBI and ENSEMBL servers

  • â€‹getKingdoms()â€‹ : Retrieve available kingdoms of life

  • â€‹getGroups()â€‹ : Retrieve available groups for a kingdom of life

  • â€‹is.genome.available()â€‹ : Check Genome Availability NCBI and ENSEMBL servers

  • â€‹getCollection()â€‹ : Retrieve a Collection: Genome, Proteome, CDS, RNA, GFF, Repeat Masker, AssemblyStats

  • â€‹getGenome()â€‹ : Download a specific genome stored on NCBI and ENSEMBL servers

  • â€‹getGenomeSet()â€‹ : Genome Retrieval of multiple species

  • â€‹getProteome()â€‹ : Download a specific proteome stored on NCBI and ENSEMBL servers

  • â€‹getProteomeSet()â€‹ : Proteome Retrieval of multiple species

  • â€‹getCDS()â€‹ : Download a specific CDS file (genome) stored on NCBI and ENSEMBL servers

  • â€‹getCDSSet()â€‹ : CDS Retrieval of multiple species

  • â€‹getRNA()â€‹ : Download a specific RNA file stored on NCBI and ENSEMBL servers

  • â€‹getRNASet()â€‹ : RNA Retrieval of multiple species

  • â€‹getGFF()â€‹ : Genome Annotation Retrieval from NCBI (*.gffâ€‹) and ENSEMBL (*.gff3â€‹) servers

  • â€‹getGTF()â€‹ : Genome Annotation Retrieval (*.gtfâ€‹) from ENSEMBL servers

  • â€‹getRepeatMasker() :â€‹ Repeat Masker TE Annotation Retrieval

  • â€‹getAssemblyStats()â€‹ : Genome Assembly Stats Retrieval from NCBI

  • â€‹getKingdomAssemblySummary()â€‹ : Helper function to retrieve the assembly_summary.txt files from NCBI for all kingdoms

  • â€‹getMetaGenomeSummary()â€‹ : Helper function to retrieve the assembly_summary.txt files from NCBI genbank metagenomes

  • â€‹getSummaryFile()â€‹ : Helper function to retrieve the assembly_summary.txt file from NCBI for a specific kingdom

  • â€‹getENSEMBLInfo()â€‹ : Retrieve ENSEMBL info file

  • â€‹getGENOMEREPORT()â€‹ : Retrieve GENOME_REPORTS file from NCBI

Import Downloaded Files

  • â€‹read\_genome()â€‹ : Import genomes as Biostrings or data.table object

  • â€‹read\_proteome()â€‹ : Import proteome as Biostrings or data.table object

  • â€‹read\_cds()â€‹ : Import CDS as Biostrings or data.table object

  • â€‹read\_gff()â€‹ : Import GFF file

  • â€‹read\_rna()â€‹ : Import RNA file

  • â€‹read\_rm()â€‹ : Import Repeat Masker output file

  • â€‹read\_assemblystats()â€‹ : Import Genome Assembly Stats File

Database Retrieval

  • â€‹listNCBIDatabases()â€‹ : Retrieve a List of Available NCBI Databases for Download

  • â€‹download.database()â€‹ : Download a NCBI database to your local hard drive

  • â€‹download.database.all()â€‹ : Download a complete NCBI Database such as e.g. NCBI nrâ€‹ to your local hard drive

BioMart Queries

  • â€‹biomart()â€‹ : Main function to query the BioMart database

  • â€‹getMarts()â€‹ : Retrieve All Available BioMart Databases

  • â€‹getDatasets()â€‹ : Retrieve All Available Datasets for a BioMart Database

  • â€‹getAttributes()â€‹ : Retrieve All Available Attributes for a Specific Dataset

  • â€‹getFilters()â€‹ : Retrieve All Available Filters for a Specific Dataset

  • â€‹organismBM()â€‹ : Function for organism specific retrieval of available BioMart marts and datasets

  • â€‹organismAttributes()â€‹ : Function for organism specific retrieval of available BioMart attributes

  • â€‹organismFilters()â€‹ : Function for organism specific retrieval of available BioMart filters

Performing Gene Ontology queries

Gene Ontology

  • â€‹getGO()â€‹ : Function to retrieve GO terms for a given set of genes

Ensembl BioMart Examples
